title: Real quick SGC Graded T206 Sale

posts.post_title: Real quick SGC Graded T206 Sale
posts.post_content:
Listing these for roughly three hours before they go to ebay.  Prices include delivery; paypal preferred.

Front and back scans available here:
[url]http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/t206hound/sgc-graded[/url]
